com.teamten.math
Class Matrix

java.lang.Object
  com.teamten.math.Matrix

public class Matrix
extends Object

Immutable matrix class. Represents each element as a double. All transformation matrices assume column vectors. In other words, a transformation matrix M will transform a column vector v by pre-multiplying it: M*v.

makeWithBasis

public static Matrix makeWithBasis(Vector x,
                                   Vector y,
                                   Vector z)
Make a 4x4 matrix with the three vectors as the basis vectors: x is the first row, y the second row, and z the third row. The bottom-right element is 1.

transform

public Vector transform(Vector vector)
Transforms the vector by the matrix. The input vector is pre-multiplied by the matrix. The input and output vectors are column vectors and have the same number of dimensions. The matrix must be square. It may have the same size as the vectors, or be one larger, in which case a "1" is added to the input vector and removed from the output vector.

transformVector

public Vector transformVector(Vector vector)
Transforms a vector (rather than a point). Only the direction is transformed. Only works on 4x4 matrices and 3-size vectors.

toString

public String toString()
Returns a string like "|1,2,3|\n|4,5,6|\n|7,8,9|" with no newline at the end.
